titles.title: Providing for consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 114) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2001, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 106-989, by Mr. Linder.

Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 114 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. The joint resolution shall be considered in the House. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 313.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 637.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 212 - 193 (Roll no. 537).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 209 - 187 (Roll no. 538).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/18/2000--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (closed) for the consideration of H. J. Res. 114 (continuing FY 2001 appropriations).
